briefdescription.para: Information retun after a call to openFile/saveDocument/createFeatureFile.

Represents a list of list of modified clusters use to enable redo action.

List of the undo numbers where the modification of clusters has been due to the deletion of spikes (moved to cluster 0 or 1, cluster of artefact and cluster of noise respectively).

detaileddescription.para: This list is used to reduce the number of cluster to redraw whenever possible.

briefdescription.para: List of the redo numbers where the modification of clusters has been due to the deletion of spikes (moved to cluster 0 or 1, cluster of artefact and cluster of noise respectively).

detaileddescription.para: This list is used to reduce the number of cluster to redraw whenever possible.

briefdescription.para: Map with keys equal to the do/undo indices and values equal to a map giving the correspondence between the old numbering and the new numbering of the clusters.
Map with keys equal to the do/undo indices and values equal to a map giving the correspondence between the new numbering and the old numbering of the clusters.

a reference to the cluster Palette.

briefdescription.para: Destructor for the fileclass of the application.
Adds a view to the document which represents the document contents.

detaileddescription.para: Usually this is your main view.

briefdescription.para: Removes a view from the list of currently connected views.
Returns the first view instance.
Returns true, if the requested view is the last view of the document.
This method gets called when the user is about to close the last view.

detaileddescription.para: If the document is modified, the user gets asked if he wants to save the document.

briefdescription.para: Sets the modified flag for the document after a modifying action on a view connected to the document.
Returns if the document is modified or not.

detaileddescription.para: Use this to determine if your document needs saving by the user on closing.

briefdescription.para: Opens the document by filename and format.

simplesect.para: an OpenSaveCreateReturnMessage enum giving the open status.

briefdescription.para: Opens a document using different format, than the one defined for the application, by filename and format.

detaileddescription.para: Not Yet implemented.

briefdescription.para: Closes the actual document.
Verifies if the document can be close.

parameterdescription.para: the main window calling this method.
the mainWindow's method which call this method.

simplesect.para: true if the document can be close, false if there still thread running and the document could not be close.

briefdescription.para: Saves the document under the file name containes in url.

simplesect.para: an OpenRetunMessage enum giving the open status

briefdescription.para: Returns the KURL of the document.
Sets the URL of the document.
Sends back the full name of the document with the electrode group Id append.
Returns the base name of the document (common name for all the files).
Sends back the directory where is store the document.
Returns the reference on the list of ClusterColor objects.

simplesect.para: ItemColors containing the information on the clusters and their associated color.

briefdescription.para: Returns a reference on data (object containing all the information).
Manages the color change of a single cluster.

detaileddescription.para:
Method call when the palette is in immediat mode (no need to press the update buton to trigger the change)
clusterId
cluster having is color changed.
activeView
the view in which the change has to be immediate.

briefdescription.para: Manages the update in the selection of clusters to be shown.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be drawn.
the view in which the change has to be immediate.

briefdescription.para: Updates the selection of clusters to be shown in the active view due to a selection in the error matrix.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be drawn.

briefdescription.para: Updates the selection of clusters to be shown in the active view due to a selection in the error matrix.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be drawn.
list of clusters corresponding to the clusters previous selected in the error matrix.

briefdescription.para: Updates the selection of clusters to be shown in the active view due to a selection in the error matrix.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be drawn in addition to those already shown.

briefdescription.para: Updates the selection of clusters to be shown by showing all the clusters except those contained in clustersToHide.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to not show.

briefdescription.para: Manages the grouping of clusters.

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be grouped.
the view in which the change has to be immediate.

briefdescription.para: Manages the deletion of clusters, if clusterId is 0, the clusters are moved to cluster 0 (cluster of artefact) if clusterId is , the clusters are moved to cluster 1 (cluster of noise).

parameterdescription.para: list of clusters to be deleted.
the view in which the change has to be immediate.
the id of the cluster to where the clusteres in clustersToDelete will be moved.

detaileddescription.para:
Starts the auto saving if it was off.
interval
saving interval.

briefdescription.para: Stops the auto saving of the document.

parameterdescription.para: true if the auto saving is stopped only for the currently open document, false if it is a change in the settings which triggered this call and therefore the auto saving is disabled completely.

the list of last modified clusters, the list will be added to the modifiedClustersUndoList.

briefdescription.para: Clears the different undo and redo lists as no undo/redo is possible after a renumbering except on the renumbering itself.

parameterdescription.para: map giving the correspondence between the old numbering and the new numbering of the clusters.
map giving the correspondence between the new numbering and the old numbering of the clusters.

briefdescription.para: Fills the undo lists (addedClustersUndoList, deletedClustersUndoList and modifiedClustersUndoList) to prepare the futur undo.

detaileddescription.para:
modifiedClustersUndoList will be fill with an empty list.
newClusters
the list of clusters created by the automaatic reclustering which will be added to the addedClustersUndoList.
deletedClusters
the list of automatically reclustered clusters which will be deleted, the list will be added to the deletedClustersUndoList.

briefdescription.para: The KlustersDoc class provides a document object that can be used in conjunction with the classes KlustersApp and KlustersView to create a document-view model for MDI (Multiple Document Interface) based on KApplication and KDockMainWindow as main classes.

detaileddescription.para:
Thereby, the document object is created by the KlustersApp instance and contains the document structure with the according methods for manipulating the document data by KlustersView objects. Also, KlustersDoc contains the methods for serialization of the document data from and to files.
Lynn Hazan
